poem:
"An Echo Across Oceans"

In the court hush, an Australian voice blooms. 
She stands, lone woman amidst nations,
grey foliage of law surrounding her.
Israel, Gaza - conflict's barren ground. 
Calling for silence,
the echo of cannon lacks empathy.
She dares to demand pause,
Voice rippling across miles,
memory blooming in the court hush,
an echo across oceans, craving 
for peace, waiting to flourish.
